text: Josh Caygill (born 22 June 1989) is a British racing driver currently racing in the British Touring Car Championship for AmD with AutoAid/RCIB Insurance Racing and the Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup for Team Parker Racing. ==Racing record== ===Complete Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup results=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !
